journeys
& notes

An investigation on the spaces between,
from Microsoft Research

Download our research paper

What is journeys & notes about?

Journeys & Notes is a delightfully curious social app for the space between an origin and a destination. Whether you're taking the bus to work across town, or jet-setting across the globe, checking-in to your trips with Journeys & Notes unlocks a community of people who have traveled the path you're on.

The road may be long and lonely, but we help connect you with others along the journey. Leave behind notes for your fellow travelers to discover, or stumble across the serendipitous gems of wisdom shared by others.

Keep a log of your
travel history

Whether you're setting personal goals for healthier and greener transportation decisions, or you just like keeping a record of your travels, Journeys & Notes is a privacy-friendly and battery-friendly way to keep a log of your trips.

a journal for your
journeys

The road is a place of wonder and inspiration. From prosaic passing thoughts to bursts of creative brilliance, the journeys we take and the ideas they inspire along the way are treasures worth preserving and sharing.

a community of
travelers

We see one another on our adventures: riding the bus, pacing the platform, quickly eating breakfast during a morning commute. For the briefest of moments we are together, a community on the train.

secrets and stories
of the road

Stones left behind by hikers form a cairn telling of visitors long past. We each have unique stories of the road and its secrets. Like stones, we sometimes leave these along the trail too, sharing our tales with fellow travelers.

  • Each new cliff is taught,
    by ages of patient waves,
    how to keep its place.

  • Bottled message? No.
    The bottle is the message
    of journeys taken

  • Walk to the end of
    the northbound platform and wait—
    a car to yourself
